Calendar of Events
Celebration Park, located adjacent to city hall, features a large gazebo along with a fountain and large shady trees.  It is great for weddings and other get togethers.  You may reserve the park by contacting Town Hall.  We will check the availability and reserve the park for you, if it is not already reserved.
